metadata.inclusion: For “Inclusion” in (adding to) a network: To add the ZP3113 to your Z-Wave network (inclusion), place your Z-Wave primary controller into inclusion mode. Press the Program Switch of ZP3113 once for sending the NIF. After sending NIF, Z-Wave will send the auto inclusion, otherwise, ZP3113 will go to sleep after 30 seconds. The LED indicator will be flashing while the inclusion is continued
metadata.exclusion: For “Exclusion” from (removing from) a network: To remove the ZP3113 from your Z-Wave network (exclusion), place your Z-Wave primary controller into “exclusion” mode, and following its instruction to delete the ZP3113 to your controller. Press the Program Switch of ZP3113 once to be excluded.
metadata.reset:
Factory Default Reset: 
Remove cover to triggered tamper switch, LED flash once & send out Alarm Report. Press Program Switch 10 times within 10 seconds, ZP3113 will send the “Device Reset Locally Notification” command and reset to the factory default. (Remark: This is to be used only in the case of primary controller being inoperable or otherwise unavailable.)
